title: MET Veleno MIPS defies boundaries as a helmet for everything dirt
content:
MET Helmets have released an off-road all-rounder, the Veleno MIPS. A removable visor, extended coverage and quality rotational impact protection, the new Veleno has all the important safety aspects covered, packaged into a lid with a versatile aesthetic for whatever bike youâ€™re riding (or crashing). MET Veleno MIPS Enduro, all-mountain, downcountry, trail riding, XC, Gravel,

author: Jessie-May Morgan
